item.title: START
item.description: This guide will walk you through essential tasks such as changing the site logo, adding new content (tags, authors, posts), and customizing your siteâ€™s pages and footer

item.title: Change Images
item.description: Learn how to change images, including the site logo, cover images, post images, and author images in Try-O-Theme.

item.description: This guide will walk you through how to add a new tag

item.description: This guide will walk you through how to add a new author

item.description: This guide will walk you through how to add a new post.

item.title: Create a custom page in navigation
item.description: This guide will walk you through how to create a custom page and add it to the navigation menu

item.title: Adding Extra Content
item.description: Learn how to add custom content to different pages in Try-O-Theme using Markdown and frontmatter in index.md files.

item.description: This guide will walk you through how to customize the footer

item.description: This guide will walk you through the basics of Markdown text formatting

item.description: This guide will walk you through how to use lists, links and images in Markdown

item.title: Theme Tweaks
item.description: Learn how to customize your Try-O-Theme by changing styles and using block directives.

item.title: GitHub Deploy
item.description: Toucan-based websites can be hosted for free using GitHub Pages. Follow these steps to set up your site

item.title: Troubleshooting
item.description: Solutions to common issues with Try-O-Theme and Toucan static site generator.
